name: Aventa
description: Aventa is a game changing crypto project that transforms the Web3 ecosystem with secure, AI-powered, multi-blockchain utilities, all seamlessly integrated into the flagship EVM based Aventa Chain. Utilities include an advanced AI chat bot (with features such as image generation, basic chart analysis etc), a contract scanner, a P2E game, NFTs and many more not yet announced. Aventa is looking to create the new generation of AI blockchain integration
